record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="info" and term=NULL and format.name="info.calendar.duty" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: info
record.format.name: info.calendar.duty

brief.brief: Use this form to maintain the operating hours schedule table.
You must make an entry in this table for each different operating hour schedule.

detail.detail: The entries consist of a table name, whether any intervals are absolute or not, and a list of beginning and ending hours for each day of the week.
- The table name must be unique.
- The beginning and ending operating hours must match up within each schedule.
- You may keep as many schedules as you require.
To scroll the table, your cursor must not be on the operating hours. If it is, you only scroll the operating hours.
To eliminate a schedule, blank out the entire schedule. On update, Service Manager moves everything up.
